q: what happened before the video is shown
pred: The video shows a man in a blue shirt and a white jacket holding a pair of skis and a pair of ski poles. He then proceeds to wax the skis and poles with a waxing machine. The man then puts the skis and poles on a machine to sharpen them. After sharpening, he puts the skis and poles back on the machine to clean them. Finally, he puts the skis and poles back on the machine to wax them again.
